1      #include <iostream>
2      void func(int a, int b, int c) {
3          int result = 0;
4          while (result < b) {
5      	result += a;
6          }
7          std::cout << "result: " << result << "\n";
8      }
9      int main() {
10          int a = 88;
11          int b = 73;
12          int c = a * b;
13          func(a,b,c);
14          return 0;
15      }


Введите ответ программы result:

1      #include <iostream>
2      int main() {
3          int a = 31;
4          int b = -5;
5          if (a == b)
6      	std::cout << "The numbers are equal" << "\n";
7          else
8      	std::cout << "The numbers are not equal" << "\n";
9          return 0;
10      }


Введите ответ программы:

1      #include <iostream>
2      #include <cmath>
3      int main() {
4          double a = 35;
5          double b = 27;
6          double c = 0;
7          double x1, x2;
8          if ((b*b - 4*a*c) >= 0) {
9              x1 = (-1*b + sqrt(b*b - 4*a*c)) / (2 * a);
10              std::cout << "x1: " << x1 << "\n";
11              x2 = (-1*b - sqrt(b*b - 4*a*c)) / (2 * a);
12              std::cout << "x2: " << x2 << "\n";
13          }
14          else {
15              std::cout << "The discriminant is less than 0" << "\n";
16          }
17          return 0;
18      }
